programme.title: Vidya
programme.desc: Vidya, an illiterate young army widow, is offered a compensatory job of teaching English in a small village school which gives her a chance to educate herself.(n)

programme.title: Shakti Astitva Ke Ehsaas Ki
programme.desc: Saumya, a transgender, goes away from her adoptive daughter Heer's life to fulfil Preeto's conditions. Meanwhile, unaware of her gender identity, Heer grows up with her fiercely protective family.(n)

programme.title: Naati Pinky Ki Lambi Love Story
programme.desc: Pinky, a spirited young woman with short stature, sets out to realise her ambitions of becoming a comedian. However, her parents thwart her plans by trying to get her married.(n)

programme.title: The Great Indian Global Kitchen
programme.desc: The chef cooks traditional Indian recipes with an international touch to them and improves the flavour and the style of presentation according to global standards.(n)

programme.title: Barrister Babu
programme.desc: Anirudh, a young lawyer from London, stops the wedding of an eight-year-old girl, Bondita, with an old man. When he is forced to marry her himself, he mentors her to fight for her rights.(n)

programme.title: Choti Sarrdaarni
programme.desc: After learning about Meher's pregnancy, her politically ambitious mother, Kulwant Kaur, gets her lover killed and forces her to marry Sarabjeet, a well-connected widower with a five-year-old son.(n)

programme.title: Bhoothnath Returns
programme.desc: A ghost (Amitabh Bachchan) returns from his 'Bhoothworld' where he is mocked for his inability to scare children. But on Earth, he has something more to do for his country.(n)

programme.title: Baabul
programme.desc: Babul tells the tale of a man (Bachchan) who tries to bring happiness back into his daughter-in-law (Mukherjee)'s life after his son (Salman)'s death.(n)

programme.title: Piku
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed comedy about the relationship between a daughter (Deepika Padukone) and her aging father (Amitabh Bachchan), whose eccentricities drive everyone crazy.(n)

programme.title: Mohabbatein
programme.desc: Six sprightly, vivacious young students come to study in his Gurukul. They do the forbidden. They fall in love. The patriarch is outraged. The lovers feel helpless. Gradually they start accepting that their relationship was probably doomed from the start. Right then steps in their savior in the form of a music teacher.(n)

programme.title: Te3n
programme.desc: A man searches for clues related to the abduction and murder of his granddaughter, while a cop and a priest investigate a new kidnapping that bears similarities to that unsolved case.(n)

programme.title: Hum Dil De Chuke Sanam
programme.desc: A newlywed man discovers that his wife is in love with another man and decides to unite them. Heedless of the ridicule he might have to face for this, he takes his wife to Italy in search of her love.(n)

programme.title: Teraa Surroor
programme.desc: Tara enlists her ex-lover Raghu's help when she gets detained for smuggling drugs in Dublin. He then sets out to punish the person who framed her.(n)

programme.title: Satellite Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar is an efficient military man who only aims to bring people together. His actions are taken note of by the public and the nation unites to help him fulfil his vow.(n)

programme.title: Kgf: Chapter 1
programme.desc: A young man's promise to his dying mother leads him on a dangerous quest for power and wealth.(n)

programme.title: Kgf: Chapter 1
programme.desc: A young man's promise to his dying mother leads him on a dangerous quest for power and wealth.(n)

programme.title: Marjaavan
programme.desc: Gangster Raghu works for Narayan Anna, the local don, and is his favourite henchman. However, Vishnu, Narayan's son, is jealous of Raghu's popularity with his father and schemes against him.(n)

programme.title: Paagalpanti
programme.desc: Three men, perceived as losers by society, wish to earn quick money and get rich. They, along with their respective girlfriends, hatch a plan to con two gangsters and steal their money.(n)

programme.title: Sui Dhaaga
programme.desc: Mauji, along with his wife, Mamta, decides to start his own garment business. To make a name for himself, he enlists the help of various artisans and participates in a renowned fashion competition.(n)

programme.title: Section 375
programme.desc: A filmmaker stands trial when a costume assistant on his movie accuses him of rape.(n)

programme.title: Sooryavansham
programme.desc: Heera fails to live up to expectations of his father Thakur Bhanupratap Singh, a powerful and respected man of his community. Despite all odds Heera struggles to keep his father's pride.(n)

programme.title: Shuddh Desi Romance
programme.desc: Story of the current generation of young boys and girls who stay away from home, date and almost get married and then there are those who run away from their marriage.(n)

programme.title: Firangi
programme.desc: Manga is in love with a girl but his joblessness stops him for asking her hand in marriage. But when he gets to work with the Britishers as a reward for a help, he realises it is working against him.(n)

programme.title: Batla House
programme.desc: Following a deadly encounter with terrorists at Batla House in Delhi, Sanjeev Kumar Yadav strives to catch the culprits while dealing with nationwide criticism and post-traumatic stress disorder.(n)

programme.title: Batla House
programme.desc: Following a deadly encounter with terrorists at Batla House in Delhi, Sanjeev Kumar Yadav strives to catch the culprits while dealing with nationwide criticism and post-traumatic stress disorder.(n)

programme.title: Patel Ki Punjabi Shaadi
programme.desc: Hasmukh Patel, a Gujarati man, finds himself at odds with his new neighbour, Guggi Tandon. To add to his woes, their children fall in love with each other.(n)

programme.title: Kabir Singh
programme.desc: Kabir, a genius yet hostile house surgeon, falls in love with Preeti, a first-year student. When Preeti's father spots the couple kissing, he opposes their relationship and decides to get her married.(n)

programme.title: Pati Patni Aur Woh
programme.desc: Chintu Tyagi is an ordinary, middle class man who finds himself torn between his wife and another woman.(n)

programme.title: Game Over
programme.desc: Swapna, a game designer, has post-traumatic stress disorder and a chronic fear of the dark. Her life turns upside down after a serial killer enters her house and creates havoc.(n)

programme.title: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic
programme.desc: God sends a rambunctious angel to help a businessman and the four orphans, whose parents he killed, become a family.(n)

programme.title: Firangi
programme.desc: Manga is in love with a girl but his joblessness stops him for asking her hand in marriage. But when he gets to work with the Britishers as a reward for a help, he realises it is working against him.(n)

programme.title: Kgf: Chapter 1
programme.desc: Rahul joins a Mumbai school as a teacher and strikes a rapport with the kids. But he soon realises that the management is more concerned about monetary obligations rather than the children. (2010).(n)

programme.title: Ladies Vs Ricky Bahl
programme.desc: A marriage is arranged between a slim guy and an overweight girl.(n)

programme.title: Ladies Vs Ricky Bahl
programme.desc: A marriage is arranged between a slim guy and an overweight girl.(n)

programme.title: Bunty Aur Babli
programme.desc: Praful, a divorcee, loses her savings in a gambling bout. She takes a loan in order to repair the damage but when she is unable to repay it, she finds herself drawn into a life of crime.(n)

programme.title: Arjun Patiala
programme.desc: Dharamraaj (Rajendra Kumar) and Balram Choudhary (Sunil Dutt) are two friends who earn their living by farming. To cement their friendship both fathers fix their children's wedding.(n)

programme.title: Piku
programme.desc: Hilarious and awe inspiring love story of an ordinary man Suri (Sharukh Khan) and his 'total opposite' love Taani (Anushka Sharma). (2008).(n)

programme.title: Aashiqui 2
programme.desc: A story of Gullu (Parineeti Chopra) who, frustrated by dowry seeking men, decides to reverse the tables on Taru (Aditya Roy Kapoor), a charming chef who owns a restaurant in Lucknow. (2014).(n)

programme.title: Bhoothnath Returns
programme.desc: In India gangsters are called Bhai (brothers). One such Bhai is Munna who cons his village-based parents into believing that he is a doctor.(n)

programme.title: Bank Chor
programme.desc: Muthu, a young man, is raised as a servant while his cousin inherits his family's property. His uncle plans to kill him when he learns that he is the rightful owner of the wealth.(n)

programme.title: Bahubali: The Beginning
programme.desc: Santosh decides to keep his grandmother Sita Mahalakshmi happy at any cost because she helped him in a game of hide and seek during his childhood.(n)

programme.title: Dil Bole Hadippa
programme.desc: A young man refuses to get rid of his live-in lover after he succeeds his father as India's prime minister. Starring Jackky Bhagnani and Neha Sharma. (2014).(n)

programme.title: Dil Bole Hadippa
programme.desc: A young man refuses to get rid of his live-in lover after he succeeds his father as India's prime minister. Starring Jackky Bhagnani and Neha Sharma. (2014).(n)

programme.title: Karwaan
programme.desc: Mohit a marketing whiz kid and Mayera, the financial brain with a penchant for shoes, are a couple in love but lacking money. Can you survive on just love and fresh air? (2014).(n)

programme.title: Thoda Pyaar Thoda Magic
programme.desc: Amar, a man with dissociative identity disorder, sets out to seek revenge against people who murdered his family and meets his childhood love, Aishwarya, who suffers from the same disorder.(n)

programme.title: Laaga Chunari Main Daag
programme.desc: Maari, a fun-loving rowdy, creates many enemies in his area due to his arrogant but righteous behaviour. Beeja, a dreaded gangster, vows to seek revenge against Maari for killing his brother.(n)

programme.title: Mardaani
programme.desc: Two wedding planner-partners achieve success but differences turn them into bitter rivals.(n)

programme.title: Alaap
programme.desc: A son is at odds with his authoritarian father when he chooses to study music instead of pursuing law. The son leaves home to make it on his own but the father tries to frustrate his efforts.(n)

programme.title: Dus
programme.desc: A terrorist plans to wreak havoc in Canada when the Indian Prime Minister plans a visit. Special agents from India are sent to nab the terrorist.(n)

programme.title: Mohabbatein
programme.desc: Two stubborn men with opposing beliefs battle each other over the running of a school, with three young love stories at stake. Starring Amitabh Bachchan, Sharukh Khan and Aishwarya Rai. (2000).(n)

programme.title: Tum Bin 2
programme.desc: After a skiing accident, Taran thinks her fiance Amar is dead and grieves for months. Soon, Shekhar enters her life, helps her rediscover happiness and falls in love with her.(n)

programme.title: Piku
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed comedy about the relationship between a daughter (Deepika Padukone) and her aging father (Amitabh Bachchan), whose eccentricities drive everyone crazy. (2015).(n)

programme.title: Romeo Juliet
programme.desc: Aishwarya assumes Kartik to be rich and falls for him. However, when she learns that he is just a gym-instructor, she breaks up with him and decides to move on with a rich man.(n)

programme.title: Arjun Patiala
programme.desc: Arjun Patiala is a quirky small-town cop, who is fond of women and even more fond of his drinks. His original and unusual ideas help reduce crime rate in the town.(n)

programme.title: Dhoom
programme.desc: A mysterious gang of bikers led by John Abraham are on a robbing spree and can only be stopped by hard hitting cop Abhishek Bachchan and goofy mechanic Uday Chopra. (2004).(n)

programme.title: Kabir Singh
programme.desc: Kabir Singh, a senior medical student, is heartbroken when his girlfriend is forced to marry another man. Already struggling with anger issues, he falls into a self-destructive spiral.(n)

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: When he loses his job, Roshan, a chef decides to spend time with his son who lives with his ex-wife. While doing so, she suggests him a business idea which he then begins to pursue.(n)

programme.title: Kill Dil
programme.desc: Dev and Tutu are brothers who were abandoned as kids when Bhaiyaji decides to adopt them and thrust them into a world of crime.(n)

programme.title: Salaam Namaste
programme.desc: A quirky tale about life and relationships with an endearing look at what being in love really means. Popular romcom starring Saif Ali Khan and Preity Zinta. (2005).(n)

programme.title: Salaam Namaste
programme.desc: A quirky tale about life and relationships with an endearing look at what being in love really means. Popular romcom starring Saif Ali Khan and Preity Zinta. (2005).(n)

programme.title: Aladin
programme.desc: A young orphan is often bullied by his peers. One day, he chances upon a life-altering object, a magic lamp. He then sets off on a series of adventures and uses the lamp to defeat the evil Ringmaster.(n)

programme.title: U Me Aur Hum
programme.desc: While on a cruise, Dr Ajay Mehra meets and falls in love with Piya and they get married. They lead a harmonious life until Piya gets pregnant and is diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.(n)

programme.title: New York
programme.desc: A taxi-driver is detained on suspicion of being a terrorist.(n)

programme.title: Intelligent
programme.desc: Teja, a software engineer, comes to the rescue of his employer when his competitors use corrupt means to destroy their business and reputation.(n)

programme.title: Piku
programme.desc: Critically acclaimed comedy about the relationship between a daughter (Deepika Padukone) and her aging father (Amitabh Bachchan), whose eccentricities drive everyone crazy. (2015).(n)

programme.title: Roadside Romeo
programme.desc: Romeo, a rich dog, is abandoned by his owners. He then finds himself embroiled in various situations and even ends up falling in love.(n)
